entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Light snow beginning near noon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Near blizzard. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Light snow. Near blizzard developing this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow early in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 37 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023
